# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  dev_doc.cir dev_doc.cir.sh tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/dev_doc.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}DEV_DOC_CAT/dev_doc.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} dev_doc.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} dev_doc.cir ${OutputDataDir}/DEV_DOC_CAT/dev_doc.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}DEV_DOC_CAT/dev_doc.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/dev_doc.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}DEV_DOC_CAT/dev_doc.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;paramdefaults;devdoc")
endif()
